Source.Name: pbr
Source.Description: PBR is a library to automatically do a bunch of standard things you want in your setup.py without you having to repeat them every time. It will set versions, process requirements files and generate AUTHORS and ChangeLog file all from git information.

Package.Name: pbr
Package.Description: PBR is a library to automatically do a bunch of standard things you want in your setup.py without you having to repeat them every time. It will set versions, process requirements files and generate AUTHORS and ChangeLog file all from git information.
